name: Cyberlife
description: Cyberlife (LIFE) is an AI-native gaming platform redefining how games are created, monetized, and owned. Powered by multimodal AI and blockchain, Cyberlife enables developers to generate game logic, 3D models, and narratives through integrations with Grok, GPT, Claude, Gemini, and WatsonX. Players and creators can tokenize games, launch player-owned economies, and earn rewards in $LIFE. Designed for scalability, interoperability, and sustainability, Cyberlife bridges artificial intelligence and decentralized ownership for the future of gaming.
